title: Ticket #700: Submit event written to Eventlog by both condor_submit and schedd
description:
One of my recent commits exposed a "feature" -- that both condor_submit and the schedd write a submit event to the event log. This is causing the lib_eventlog test to fail.

The order of things appears to be thus:

  1. condor_submit submits job to schedd
  2. schedd writes partial submit event to event log
  3. condor_submit writes correct submit event to event log

I've captured the whole exchange via strace.

I'm not entirely certain why we haven't been observing this behavior forever.
remarks:
2009-Aug-27 21:31:10 by nleroy:
Ahh, found the problem. Looks like my commit caused WriteUserLog to ignore the call to SetGlobalWriteLog().
